languages.text: {n}Оба священника погружаются в размышления. Старший подает голос первым.{/n} "Если служить верно, то Император сохранит твою душу в своих чертогах".
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
languages.original_text: {n}Оба священника погружаются в размышления. Старший подает голос первым.{/n} "Если служить верно, то Император сохранит твою душу в своих чертогах".

traits.locale_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older one is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older one is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."
{n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

languages.text: {n}两位牧师都认真思考着这个问题，随后，年长的牧师率先开了口。{/n}“若是帝皇的仆人尽心侍奉祂，祂便会把他们的灵魂留在祂的圣殿里。”
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}两位牧师都认真思考着这个问题，随后，年长的牧师率先开了口。{/n}“若是帝皇的仆人尽心侍奉祂，祂便会把他们的灵魂留在祂的圣殿里。”

languages.text: {n}二人の司祭はしばらくの間、その問いについて思案した。老司祭が最初に口を開いた。{/n}「忠実にお仕えすれば、その魂は皇帝陛下の神聖なる宮殿にて守られるでしょう」
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}二人の司祭はしばらくの間、その問いについて思案した。老司祭が最初に口を開いた。{/n}「忠実にお仕えすれば、その魂は皇帝陛下の神聖なる宮殿にて守られるでしょう」

languages.text: {n}Ambos sacerdotes meditan la pregunta durante un rato. El más anciano es el primero en responder:{/n} «Si ha servido fielmente, el Emperador acogerá su alma en Sus estancias sagradas».
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ambos sacerdotes meditan la pregunta durante un rato. El más anciano es el primero en responder:{/n} «Si ha servido fielmente, el Emperador acogerá su alma en Sus estancias sagradas».

languages.text: {n}Her iki rahip de bir süre düşünüyor. Önce yaşlı olan cevaplıyor.{/n} "Sadakatle kulluk ederlerse İmparator, ruhlarını salonlarında muhafaza eder."
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Her iki rahip de bir süre düşünüyor. Önce büyük olan cevaplıyor.{/n} "Sadakatle kulluk ederlerse İmparator, ruhlarını salonlarında muhafaza eder."

languages.text: {n}Les deux prêtres réfléchissent un moment à la question. Le plus vieux est le premier à prendre la parole :{/n} « S'il sert fidèlement, l'Empereur préservera son âme dans Son palais. »
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les deux prêtres réfléchissent un moment à la question. Le plus vieux est le premier à prendre la parole :{/n} « S'il sert fidèlement, l'Empereur préservera son âme dans Son palais. »

languages.text: {n}Beide Priester denken eine Weile über die Frage nach. Der Ältere spricht als Erster:{/n} "Wenn sie im Glauben gedient haben, wird der Imperator ihre Seelen in Seinen Hallen bewahren."
languages.original_text: {n}Both priests ponder the question for a while. The older is the first to speak up:{/n} "Should they serve faithfully, the Emperor will preserve their soul in His halls."

traits.locale_text: {n}Beide Priester denken eine Weile über die Frage nach. Der Ältere spricht als Erster:{/n} "Wenn sie im Glauben gedient haben, wird der Imperator ihre Seelen in Seinen Hallen bewahren."
